param.name: input
param.label: Input is whitespace-separated list of genes, proteins, probes, term IDs or chromosomal regions.

param.name: organism
param.label: Enter organism ID
param.help: Organism IDs are constructed by concatenating the first letter of the generic name and the specific name. E.g., human — Homo sapiens — ’hsapiens’, mouse — Mus musculus — ’mmusculus’, thale cress — Arabidopsis thaliana — ’athaliana’. Check the help section below for the complete list of supported organism IDs.

param.name: filter_na
param.label: Filter N/A
param.help: Whether to filter out results without a corresponding target name.

param.name: base_url
param.label: Base URL
param.help: Useful for overriding the default URL (http://biit.cs.ut.ee/gprofiler) with the beta (https://biit.cs.ut.ee/gprofiler_beta) or a compatible archived version (available starting from the version e94_eg41_p11, e.g. https://biit.cs.ut.ee/gprofiler_archive3/e94_eg41_p11).
